title: cheese

defs.en: a food made from milk, that can be either firm or soft and is usually yellow or white in colour

eg.en: Would you like a slice/piece of cheese with your bread?
eg.tr: 你想要块奶酪配面包吃吗？

eg.en: You need 250 grams of grated cheese for this recipe.
eg.tr: 按照这张食谱，你需要250克磨碎的奶酪。

eg.en: I like soft French cheeses such as Brie and Camembert.
eg.tr: 我喜欢法国软奶酪，比如布里奶酪和卡芒贝尔奶酪。

eg.en: I prefer hard cheeses, like cheddar.
eg.tr: 我更喜欢硬奶酪，比如切德奶酪。

preview: 1. a food made from milk, that can be either firm or soft and is usually yellow or white in colour 奶酪，干酪。
